John Coppinger wrote:

> Here's what I did wrong: The README clearly says not to put 
> junit-4.1.jar in the extensions
> directory.
> 
> But did I pay attention to this? No I did not. Consequently, the 
> classloader for extension jars
> couldn't find the test class files on the CLASSPATH.

I vote this for the greatest message by a newbie in the history of this 
mailing list.
